title: Trinity Force and Essence Reaver is 40% CDR, 40% Crit, Spellblade, mana sustain
body:
Full Stats:
90 AD
250 Mana
5% Movement Speed
40% Critical Hit Chance
40% Cool-down Reduction
15% Attack Speed
Critical strikes restore 3% of your maximum Mana pool.
Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed. Kills grant 60 instead. Halved for ranged champions.
After using an ability, your next basic attack deals an additional 200% base AD. 1.5s cooldown.


These two items seem to have a lot of synergy together. Reaver keeps your mana up so you can spam your stuff everywhere. They get you max CDR for maximum spammage, and 40% crit chance is nothing to sniff at. With the AD nerfs 90 AD is significant enough. 

Just wondering who could abuse these. {{champion:120}} Hecarim sounds somewhat viable, but probably has better things to be building than essence reaver since you want to get tanky. It sounds LETHAL on {{champion:81}} Ezreal, {{champion:42}} Corki or {{champion:126}} Jayce though. Mostly {{champion:81}} Ezreal. The CANE {{champion:75}} feels again like Hecarim. In theory, sure. In practice he probably would much rather get tanky. 

{{champion:236}} Lucian maybe?
